title: Know and Recognize Voter Intimidation: State by State Guides on Laws Regarding Unauthorized Private Militia Groups and What to do if Armed Individuals are Near a Polling Place
selftext:
Courtesy of Georgetown Law's Institute for Constitutional Advocacy and Protection

[https://www.law.georgetown.edu/icap/our-work/addressing-the-rise-of-unlawful-private-paramilitaries/state-fact-sheets/](https://www.law.georgetown.edu/icap/our-work/addressing-the-rise-of-unlawful-private-paramilitaries/state-fact-sheets/)
